snippet.title: Arashi no Yoruni Gameplay Nintendo DS
snippet.description:
Arashi no Yoruni Walkthrough

Let's Play - Arashi no Yoruni

ABOUT THIS GAME

Arashi no You Ni is a text-based adventure based off a popular book of the same name. The storyline centers on the friendship between a wolf and a goat who meet in a mountain cabin. The sound novel includes six mini games, which are played in-between the story's seven chapters.

Arashi no Yoruni is an Adventure game, developed by Hyde and published by TDK Core, which was released in Japan in 2005.
